ygData.subject: Re: Sean.Clark@UCHSC.edu
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Nick hahaha,  This person does not know too much about the internet.  Ever hear about Message Rules?  You can have emails BLOCKED you know.  Now, I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Nick

hahaha, This person does not know too much about the internet. Ever hear about Message Rules? You can have emails BLOCKED you know. Now, I don't know what that person wrote to you, But there's nothing really a court can do about this. I know. I work for a ISP, and just about all you can do is get there account terminated from that ISP. Now if I was getting crap mail like that. It's going right to my Blocked list to be deleted of the server.


*wishes people had to take a IQ test to be able to get on the internet*
----- Original Message -----
From: Nick
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 1:36 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Sean.Clark@...


Well, I warned this person to stop emailing me. As per my lawyers request I had warned him before not to email me or a proof reading fee would be exempted to his university/his parents. He sent me an email this morning that was lengthy and I didn't even bother reading it. Again (to the people of the list), do not send me private emails. Mr. Clark is going to have to go to small claims court because of his actions.
